dynamic_line.no: Hey bro, why the fuck are you hanging around here?

responses.text: There's no need to be so rude. Are you always this unfriendly?
I want to buy myself something, do you have anything to offer?
Do you have any more work for me?
Can you teach me how to fight properly?

dynamic_line: What...? Hey, either say what you need or fuck off before your teeth fall out.

responses.text: I came for the adrenaline. Maybe you have some interesting suggestions?
I want to buy myself something, do you have anything to offer?

dynamic_line: Then why the hell are you bothering me? Get out of here!

responses.text: Calm down. Why are you so nervous?

dynamic_line: Why? WHY!? You asked for it!!

You finally ready to learn how to fight properly? Took you long enough! Your old moves were ass. Here, let me teach you how to punch proper..
*Duglas takes time teaching you how to fight using the Rusted Chains martial art.*

effect.u_message: You have been taught the Rusted Chain's martial art.
